Deng Ai 邓艾
The Staunch Warrior 矫然的壮士

Amassing Terrain 屯田
Every instance that you lose or play card(s) (on-hand or equipped) outside your turn, you can flip a judgement card. If the judgement is not the suit of hearts, you can put the judgement card (referred to as Terrain) atop your character card. Every Terrain that you amass, you get a -1 bonus.


Conduit 凿险
(Awakening) At the beginning of your turn, if you have more than or equal to 3 Terrains, you must reduce your maximum health by 1 unit. You will then permanently acquire the ability Blitz 急袭 (In the action phase, you can use any of your Terrains as STEAL). Awakening is once per game.
Jiang Wei:
Jiang Wei 姜维
The Protégé of the Dragon 龙的衣钵

Taunt 挑衅
During the action phase, you can pick a player that is able to strike you using attack. That player must use an attack on you. If the player does not do so, you can discard one of his/her card. Limited to once per turn.


Recommence the Legacy 志继
(Awakening) At the start of your turn, if you have no on-hand cards, you must regain 1 unit of health or draw 2 cards, then reduce your maximum health by 1 unit, and permanently acquire the ability Astrology 观星 (Zhuge Liang's ability, before his judgment you can look at the top X cards of the deck, X either the number of characters in play or 5, whichever number is smaller. He can then rearrange the order of these cards and put as many on the bottom of the deck as he chooses). Awakening is once per game.
Liu Shan:
Liu Shan 刘禅
The King with a Laissez-faire Destiny 无为的真命主

Relish 享乐
Whenever other player targets an attack at you, he/she must discard a basic card, or that attack has no effect on you.


Devolution 放权
You can skip your action phase. If you do so, you can discard an on-hand card after your discard phase and let another player go an extra turn immediately. Play order then returns to normal (person to your right plays).


Eiron 若愚
(Awakening) King Ability: At the start of your turn, if your health is the least or among the least, you must raise your maximum health by 1 unit, regain 1 unit of health and permanently acquire get the ability Fierce General 激将 (Liu Bei's ability, if you need to use an attack, you can ask any member of Shu to provide him one). Awakening is once per game.
Sun Ce:
Sun Ce 孙策
The Young Conqueror of Jiang Dong 江东的小霸王

Ardor 激昂
Whenever you use or become the target of DUEL or a red-suited attack, you can draw a card.


Divine Aura 魂姿
(Awakening) At the beginning of your turn, if your health is 1 unit, you must reduce your maximum health by 1 unit. You then permanently acquire the abilities Brave Gesture 英姿 and Lingering Spirit 英魂 (Zhou Yu's ability of draw an extra card during draw phase, and Sun Jian's ability of at start of turn, if you are damaged, you can force anyone else to draw 1 then discard X, or draw X then discard 1, where X is the life you have lost). Awakening is once per game.


Hegemony 制霸
King Ability: During the action phase of other Wu characters, they can choose to compete once with you. If they do not win, you can take the cards used in compete from both parties. After your Awakening ability activates, you can refuse the compete.
Zhang Zhao & Zhang Hong:
Zhang Zhao & Zhang Hong 张昭&张纮
Talents to administrate Heaven and Earth 经天纬地

Blunt advice 直谏
In the action phase, you can put an on-hand equipment card in the equipped card area of another character (you cannot replace an equipment already equipped). If you do so, you can draw a card.


Stabilization 固政
At the end of other players’ discard phase, you can return a card that was discarded in this phase to the player. If you do so, you can take the other cards discarded in this phase as your own on-hand cards.
Cai Wen Ji:
Cai Wen Ji 蔡文姬
The Lone Dame in Foreign Lands 异乡的孤女

Dirge 悲歌
Every instance a player suffers damage from an attack, you can discard a card (on-hand or equipped), and the player who suffered the damage flips a judgement card. Hearts, the victim regains 1 unit of health. Diamonds, the victim draws 2 cards. Clubs, the attacker discards 2 cards. Spades, the attacker flips his/her character card over (If they are flipped face down, they flip face up).


Sorrow 断肠
The player who kills you loses all of his/her character abilities until the end of the game.
Cao Zhi:
Cao Zhi 曹植
Eight-Tenths of the world's Talent 八斗之才

Falling Bloom 落英
When other players discard or flip judgement cards with clubs into the discard pile, you can take possession of these cards (when a character dies, they discard all their cards).

Drunken Quatrain 酒诗
When your character card is facing up, you can choose to flip over your character card and this will be considered as having used wine. When you suffer damage while your character card is facing down, you can choose to flip over your character card such that is faces up after the damage you received is concluded.
Gao Shun:
Gao Shun 高顺
No Siege is Unsuccessful 攻无不克

Ambush 陷阵
Once per turn during your action phase, you can compete with another player. If you win, you can disregard any distance between you and that player, any equipped armour they have and you can use as many attack cards on them until end of turn. If you lose, you cannot use any attack cards for the remainder of this turn.

Abnegation 禁酒
All your wine cards must be regarded as attack cards.
Chen Gong:
Chen Gong 陈宫
Upright and Heroic 刚直壮烈

Brilliant Scheme 明策
Once per turn during your action phase, you can give an equipment card or an attack card to any other player. The recipient must then choose between 1 of 2 options.
1. This action would be viewed as the recipient having used an attack on another player of your choice within their attacking range.
2. Recipient draws a card from the deck.

Cerebral Delay 智迟
Whenever you receive damage during another player's turn, any attack or non-delay tool cards have no effect on you until that turn ends.
Fa Zheng:
Fa Zheng 法正
The Wind beneath Shu Kingdom's Wings 蜀汉的辅翼

Reciprocation 恩怨
Whenever you receive 2 or more cards from another player, you can allow that player to draw 1 card; For each unit of damage you receive, you can make the source of the damage give you 1 on-hand card, or he/she loses 1 unit of health.

Artifice of the Masses 眩惑
In the drawing phase, you can forgo drawing cards and force another player to draw 2 cards, then let that player use an attack on another player of your choice that is within his/her attacking range. If the player does not do so, you will receive those 2 cards that the player drew.
Ling Tong:
Ling Tong 凌统
Forthright and Courageous 豪情烈胆

Tempest 旋风
Each instance that you lose equipped cards, or you discard 2 or more cards in your discard phase, you can discard a total of 2 cards from up to maximum of 2 players (either 2 cards from 1 player, or 1 card from 2 players).
Ma Su:
Ma Su 马谡
The Conceited Talent 怀才自负

Spreading Rumours 散谣
Once per turn during your action phase, you can discard 1 card and choose a player with the highest units of health to deal 1 damage to them.

Restrict Barbarians 制蛮
Whenever you deal damage to other players, you can prevent the damage dealt to take a card from their equipment zone or judgement zone.
Wu Guo Tai:
Wu Guo Tai 吴国太
Fearsome Militant Empress 武烈皇后

Heavenly Essence 甘露
Once per turn during your action phase, you can choose 2 players to exchange all of their equipped cards. The difference in the number of equipped cards between the 2 players must not be more than X, where X is the amount of health you have lost thus far.

Ameliorate 补益
When a player is at the brink of death, you can display one of the on-hand cards of that player. If that card is not a basic card, the player will discard that card and regain 1 unit of health.
Xu Sheng:
Xu Sheng 徐盛
The Steel Barricade of Jiang Dong 江东的铁壁

Annihilate 破军
In your action phase, when you target a player with attack, you can remove up to X cards from that player from the game, where X is their current life. If you do, they get those cards back into their hand after the end of your turn. (You can place the cards on your character card to show that they are removed.)
Xu Shu:
Xu Shu 徐庶
The Loyal Gallant 忠孝的侠士

Silence 无言
Damage caused by you from tool cards are prevented. Damaged caused to you from tool cards are prevented.

Dragon's Advocate 举荐
After your discard phase, you can discard 1 non-Basic card (ie: Tools cards, equipment cards, etc). If you do so, you let another player choose 1 of the following 3 possible actions:
1. Draw 2 cards.
2. Regain 1 unit of health.
3. If the player is flipped, they can unflip it. If they are chained, they can stop being in the chain.
Yu Jin:
Yu Jin 于禁
Mainstay of the Wei Military 魏武之刚

Resolute 毅重
After your discard phase, you can discard a hand card and choose another player. They can place one a card (referred to as Military Ruler) atop your character card. If they don't do so, you can discard one of their cards. As long as you have a Military Ruler card, you can use red hand cards as ESCAPE and black hand cards as NEGATE. At the start of your turn, put the Military Ruler card into your hand.
Zhang Chun Hua:
Zhang Chun Hua 张春华
Cold-blooded Empress 冷血皇后

Ruthless 绝情
All damage you are about to inflict is converted to loss of health. (There is no 'source' for the health lost. This loss of health is always non-elemental, so it can't cause the chain effect. You don't get rewards/penalties for killing players.)

Bereavement 伤逝
With the exception of the discard phase, whenever your number of on-hand cards is less than X, you can immediately draw from the deck till your on-hand cards equal number of units of health loss, where X is the amount of health you have lost thus far.
Bu Lianshi:
Bu Lianshi 步练师
The Uncrowned Empress 无冕之后

Pacify 安恤
Once per turn during your action phase, you can select two players with different amounts of hand cards. The player with more hands cards must give the player with fewer hand cards one card. Then, if the hand sizes of the two players are equal, you can choose to draw a card or recover one unit of health.

In Loving Memory 追忆
When you die, you can choose one player (other than the player who killed you) to draw 3 cards and regain 1 unit of health.
Liu Biao:
Liu Biao 刘表
Lord of Southern Han 跨蹈汉南

Self-preservation 自守
During the drawing phase, you may draw additional X number of cards (X being the number of allegiances still in play). If you do so, cards you play this turn cannot target other players (You can't play barbarians/hail of arrows, if you play harvest, you will be the only player that can pick up cards).

House of Royalty 宗室
Your hand card limit is increased by X (X being the number of allegiances still in play).
Gong Sun Zan:
Gong Sun Zan 公孙瓒
The Whitehorse General 白馬將軍

Fierce 趫猛
After a black attack played by you deals damage, you can discard a card in that player's equipment area. If that equipment is a horse, you can put it in your hand.

Righteous Cavalry 义从
When you have 3 or more units of health, you have -1 bonus. When you have 2 or fewer units of health, you have +1 bonus.
Cheng Pu:
Cheng Pu 程普
Minister spanning 3 Generations 三朝之臣

Toxic Pyre 疠火
You can use 1 normal attack as FIRE attack. If this converted FIRE attack causes damage, you lose 1 unit of health after all damage calculations has been concluded. Whenever you use FIRE attack, you can select 1 additional target player.

Superior Vintage 醇醪
When the ending phase of your turn begins, if there are no cards on your character card, you can place any number of attack cards on your character card (these cards are referred to as Vintage). When a player is on the brink on death, you can discard a Vintage card and this is viewed as the player having used wine.
Han Dang:
Han Dang 韩当
Marquis of Shi Cheng 石城侯

Mounted Archer 弓骑
Once per turn during your action phase, you can discard a card to have unlimited attack range this turn. If the card you discarded was an equipment card, you can discard a card from another player.

Resolver of Troubles 解烦
Once per game during your action phase, you can select a player. Every player who has that player in their attack range must choose one:
1. Discard a weapon card.
2. Let that player draw a card.
Guan Xing & Zhang Bao:
Guan Xing & Zhang Bao 关兴 & 张苞
Cubs of the Generals 将门虎子

Spirit of their Fathers 父魂
When an attack is desired, you can decide to discard two hand cards to generate the attack. When you deal damage in your turn with an attack, you get Fighting Saint 武圣 and Roar 咆哮 until end of turn (Guan Yu's ability to play any red cards as attack, and Zhang Fei's ability to play any amounts of attack per turn).
Liao Hua:
Liao Hua 廖化
Put through the Mill of Time 历经沧桑

Forefront 当先
At the beginning of your turn, you perform an extra action phase.

Longetivity 伏枥
When you are on the brink of death, you can regain X units of health (X being the number of allegiances still in play). Then, you must flip your character card.
Ma Dai:
Ma Dai 马岱
Entrusted during the crisis 临危受命

Horsemanship 马术
Ma Dai always has a -1 bonus.

Backstab 潜袭
At the beginning of your turn, you can draw a card, then discard a card. If you do, you choose a character whose distance between you is 1, and they cannot use or play cards with the same suit as the card you discarded until end of turn.
Wang Yi:
Wang Yi 王异
The Elated Damsel 快意的巾帼

Death over Desecration 贞烈
After you become the target of an attack or non-delay tool card from another player, you can choose to lose 1 unit of health. If you do, that card becomes ineffective towards you and you discard a card from that player.

Secret Plan 秘计
After your discard phase, you can draw X cards (X is the the amount of life you have lost thus far). You can then give the same amount of hand cards to other players.
Zhong Hui:
Zhong Hui 钟会
The Audacious Schemer 桀骜的野心家

Amassing Power 权计
For each unit of damage Zhong Hui receives, you can draw 1 card, then place 1 on-hand card on your character card. This card will be known as a Power card. Every Power card you have on your character card, your on-hand card limit increases by 1.

Uprising 自立
(Awakening) At the start of your turn, if you have 3 or more Power cards, you must reduce 1 unit of your maximum health limit, then either regain 1 unit of health or draw 2 cards. You also acquire the ability Eradicate 排异 (Once per turn in your action phase, you can discard 1 Power card and allow any player to draw 2 cards. After drawing 2 cards, if that player has more on-hand cards than you, you inflict 1 unit of damage on that player). Awakening is once per game.
Cao Zhang:
Cao Zhang 曹彰
The Yellow Bearded Son 黄须儿

Versatile Fighter 将驰
During the drawing phase, you can choose one:
1. Draw 1 extra card. If you do so, you cannot use or play any attack cards until your turn is over.
2. Draw 1 card less. If you do so, until end of turn, any attack cards used during your action phase has unlimited range. You can also use 1 more attack card in this turn.
Xun You:
Xun You 荀攸
Master Strategist of Cao Wei 曹魏的谋主

Contrivance 奇策
Once per turn in your action phase, you can use all your on-hand cards (minimum of one) as any one non-delay tool card.

Playing Dumb 智愚
Every instance after you receive damage, you can draw a card, then display all your on-hand cards. If all your on-hand cards are of the same colour, the source of your damage must discard one on-hand card.
Cao Chong:
Cao Chong 曹冲
Caring Child Prodigy 仁爱的神童

Weigh the Elephant 称象
After you take damage, you can reveal the top 4 cards of the deck. You can then put any amount of cards into your hand such that the cards taken have their point total equal or less than 13.

Benevolence 仁心
Whenever another player with 1 unit of life is taking damage, you can turn over your character card and discard an equipment card to prevent this damage.
Guo Huai:
Guo Huai 郭淮
Seeking Harmony 垂问秦雍

Refined Strategy 精策
At the end of your action phase, if the number of cards you have played this turn is equal or more than your current life, you can draw 2 cards.
Man Chong:
Man Chong 满宠
Political and Military Strategist 政法兵谋

Corporal Punishment 峻刑
Once per turn during your action phase, you can select any character and discard any number of your hand cards. The target must discard a hand card of a different type than the ones you have discarded (the three types are basic, tool and equipment). If they do not, they flip their character card and draw X cards, X being the number of cards discarded by you.

Defense Strategy 御策
When you are damaged, you can show one of your hand cards. The source of damage must discard a card of a different type or you recover one unit of health.
Guan Ping:
Guan Ping 关平
Loyal and Dutiful Son 忠臣孝子

Dragon Roar 龙吟
Whenever any player attacks, you can discard any card to allow that player to attack again during that turn. If you activate this ability in response to a red-suited Attack, you get to draw a card.
Jian Yong:
Jian Yong 简雍
Leisurely and Carefree as the Wind 优游风议

Persuade 巧说
At the beginning of your action phase, you can compete with any other character. If you win, you can increase or decrease the number of targets of your next basic or non-delay tool by one for this turn. There are no range restrictions for the extra target. If you lose, you cannot use any tool cards for the rest of your turn.

Ignore Formalities 纵适
After you compete, you can put the loser's competition card into your hand.
Liu Feng:
Liu Feng 刘封
Shamed Tiger Walking to his Death 骑虎之殇

Fallen Heir 陷嗣
At the beginning of your turn, you can select up to two other players. You take a card from each and put them on your character card (referred to as Betrayal). Other characters can discard two Betrayals from your character card, and it is viewed as them playing an attack on you (still follows normal attack rules, must be in their action phase, you must be in their range, only one attack per turn, etc).
Pan Zhang & Ma Zhong:
Pan Zhang & Ma Zhong 潘璋 & 马忠
Tigers that Capture Dragons 擒龙伏虎

Seize Weapon 夺刀
When you are damaged with an attack, you can discard a card and place the equipped weapon of the source in your hand.

Silent Arrow 暗箭
When you damage a character with an attack and that character does not have you within their attack range, the damage is increased by one.
Yu Fan:
Yu Fan 虞翻
Crazy Scholar 狂直之士

Release Into Abyss 纵玄
Whenever your cards are discarded, you can place them on the top of the deck (takes priority over Cao Zhi and Zhang Zhao & Zhang Hong's abilities).

Blunt Words 直言
After your discard phase, you can choose any character. This character flips the top card of the deck (doesn't count as a judgement). If it is a piece of equipment, this card is placed in their equipment area and they recover one unit of health. Otherwise, the card is placed in their hand.
Zhu Ran:
Zhu Ran 朱然
Motionless Commander 不动之督

Nerves of Steel 胆守
In your action phase, you can choose any player in your attacking range and discard X cards (X is the number of times you have activated Nerves of Steel this action phase). If X is one, the target must discard one. If X is two, the target must give you a card. If X is three, you deal one damage to the target. If X is four or more, both you and the target draw two cards.
Empress Fu:
Empress Fu 伏皇后
Desperate Last Note 孤注一掷

Anxious Fear 惴恐
At the beginning of other players' turns, if you are damaged, you can compete with them. If you win, cards they play this turn cannot target other players except themself (they can't play barbarians/hail of arrows, if they play harvest, they will be the only player that can pick up cards). If you lose, they calculate their distance to you as 1.

Plead 求援
When you are attacked, you can select any third character. They can reveal an escape and give it to you, otherwise they become a second target for the attack.
Li Ru:
Li Ru 李儒
Daemon Minister 魔仕

Vanishing Act 绝策
After your discard phase, you can deal 1 damage to a player that doesn't have any hand cards.

Extermination 灭计
Once per turn during your action phase, you can reveal a black tool card, then place it on the top of the deck. You select another player, and they must discard a tool card or discard 2 non-tool cards.

Burn the City 焚城
Once per game during your action phase, you can force all other players to discard X+1 cards or receive two units of fire damage caused by you (X is the number of cards discarded by the previous character that was affected by this ability).
Cao Zhen:
Cao Zhen 曹真
Heavenly Guardian of the Country 荷国天督

Enemy Foresight 司敵
Whenever you use an escape or any other player uses an escape during your turn, you can put the top card of the deck on your character card (referred to as Jin). At the beginning of any other players action phase, you can remove a Jin to reduce the number of attacks that the current player can use by one.
Han Hao & Shi Huan:
Han Hao & Shi Huan 韩浩&史渙
King's Main Army 中军之主

Reckless Abandon 慎断
Whenever you discard a black basic card (e.g. in discard phase or due to break), they can put it on any player as a starvation without distance limit.

Bold Strategy 勇略
At the start of another player's judgement phase, if they are within your attacking range, you can discard one of their pending judgement cards. If you do, it is viewed as you attacking that player. If they don't get damaged from this attack, you draw a card.
Chen Qun:
Chen Qun 陳群
Minister of all Ages 万世臣表

Production 定品
During your action phase, you can discard a hand card of a type you have not used or discarded this turn (the three types are basic, tool and equipment) and select an injured player to make a judgement. If the result is black, they draw X cards (X is how much hp they are missing), and you can't use production for the rest of this turn. If the result is red, you flip over your character card.

Justice and Mercy 法恩
When any player flips their character card or enters the chained state, you can let that player draw one.
Wu Yi:
Wu Yi 吴懿
Building Power of Cavalry 建兴鞍辔

Distant Charge 奔袭
During your turn, whenever you play a card, you get a -1 bonus until the end of turn. As long as all players are within your range, other player's armour are ineffective, and you can specify one extra target for attack.
Zhou Cang:
Zhou Cang 周倉
Wearing a Heart of Courage 披肝沥胆

Loyalty and Bravery 忠勇
When you attack and the target uses an escape, you can give that escape to any player except the target. If you give it to someone other than yourself, you can use an additional attack on the target.
Zhang Song:
Zhang Song 张松
Phoenix Breaking into the Heart 怀壁待凤仪

Inside Knowledge 强识
At the beginning of your action phase, you can reveal a hand card from another player to everyone. If you use any card of the same type as that one for the rest of the turn, you draw a card (the three types are basic, tool and equipment).

Map Offering 献图
At the beginning of another player's action phase, you can choose to draw two cards, and then give them two cards. If you do, at the end of this action phase, if they didn't kill another player this phase, you lose 1 unit of health.
Sun Lu Ban:
Sun Lu Ban 孫鲁班
Staying with a Tiger 为虎作伥

Ruin with Slander 谮毁
Once per turn during your action phase, when you use an attack or black non-delay tool card to specify only one target, you can select a third player. This third player chooses to give you a card and become the source of the card you played, or also become a target.

Pride 骄矜
When a male damages you, you can discard an equipment card to reduce the amount of damage they take by one.
Zhu Huan:
Zhu Huan 朱桓
Center of the State Refusing Heaven 中州拒天人

Inspiring 奮勵
If you have the most hand cards among alive players, you can skip your draw phase. If you have the most HP among alive players, you can skip your action phase. If you have the most equipment cards in your equipment zone among all alive players, you can skip your discard phase.

Slaying Bandits 平寇
After your discard phase, you deal one unit of damage up to X other players, where X is the number of phases you have skipped this turn.
Gu Yong:
Gu Yong 顾雍
Shining Temple of Jade 庙堂的玉磬

Caution 慎行
During your action phase, you can discard two cards to draw a card.

Control 秉壹
After your discard phase, you can reveal your hand. If it's all the same colour, you can choose X players and they all draw a card (X is the number of cards in your hand).
Ju Shou:
Ju Shou 沮授
Military Prison Schemer 监军谋国

Progressive Strategy 渐营
When you play a card in your action phase that has the same colour or number as the previous card you played this phase, you can draw a card.

Northern Arrow 矢北
When you are damaged, if it is the first time you took damage this turn, you restore a unit of health. If it isn't the first time, you lose a unit of health.
Lady Cai:
Lady Cai 蔡夫人
Flower of the River 襄江的蒲苇

Eavesdrop 窃听
At the end of another player's turn, if they did not specifically target another player with cards, you can either draw a card or take one of their equipped cards and equip it on yourself (e.g. barbarians do not specifically target a player, you can't take their equipment and equip it on yourself if you already have something equipped in that slot).

Surrender 献州
Once per game in your action phase, you can give another player all of your equipped cards (goes to their hand). The target then decides to let you recover X or to deal one unit of damage up to X people in their attack range (X is the number of cards that you gave).
Cao Xiu:
Cao Xiu 曹休
A Thousand Miles Away 千里騏驥

Thousand Horses 千駒
You have a -X bonus (X is the difference between your max health and your current health).

Infiltration 傾襲
When your attack deals damage to its target, if you have a weapon in your equipment zone, you can let the target choose one:
1. Discard hand cards equal to the weapon card's attack range, then discard the weapon.
2. Increase the damage taken by one.
Cao Rui:
Cao Rui 曹叡
Talented and Wise Monarch 天姿的明君

Carry Forward 恢拓
Every instance you are damaged, you can choose any player to make a judgement. If the result is red, they restore one unit of health. If the result is black, they draw X cards (X is the damage dealt).

Perceive 明鉴
Once per turn during your action phase, you can give all your hand cards to another player. If you do, that player has their hand size limit increased by 1 for their next turn, and can use an additional attack in their action phase.

Rise and Fall 兴衰
King Ability: Once per game, when you enter the brink of death, you can let each other Wei member choose whether to let you restore one unit of health. Those who do will take one unit of damage afterwards.
Zhong Yao:
Zhong Yao 鍾繇
Calligrapher of Wei 正楷蕭曹

Living Ink 活墨
Whenever you want to use a basic card that you have not used before this turn, you can reveal a black non-basic card (or black equipment in your equipment zone) and put it on top of the deck. If you do, it is viewed as you using that basic card (e.g. you could use living ink to play peach, then play a real peach on one turn, but not the other way around).

Align 佐定
After other characters uses a spades cards to target player(s) in their action phase, if no player has taken damage in this phase before this point, you can make one of the targets draw a card (playing equipment counts towards targeting themself).
Liu Chen:
Liu Chen 刘谌
Sacrificing Blood for the Nation 血薦軒轅

Duel to the Death 戰絕
During your action phase, you can use all your on-hand cards (minimum of one) as duel. Afterwards, you and person who took damage from this duel draw a card each (you draw a card even if it was negated). If you draw two or more cards this way, you can't use this ability until end of turn.

Diligent King 勤王
King Ability: When you need to use an attack, if there are other Shu members, you can discard a card and you will let other Shu members decide whether play an attack. The player who does draws a card.
Xiahou Shi:
Xiahou Shi 夏侯氏
Picking up Harmony 采緣擷睦

Firewood Collection 樵拾
After the discard phase of other players, if their hand card size is the same as yours, you can choose to let both players draw a card.

Banquet and Chatting 燕語
You can recast attack (discard the attack and draw a card, but doesn't count as discarding or playing the card). At the end of your action phase, if you have recast at least two attacks, you can select a male character to draw two cards.
Zhang Yi:
Zhang Yi 张嶷
Open-minded and Powerful 通壯逾古

Psychological Warfare 憮戎
Once per turn during your action phase, you can display a hand card with another target player with at least one hand card at the same time. If the card you displayed was an attack and they didn't display a escape, you discard your attack and you deal one damage to them. If the card you displayed wasn't an attack and they did display a dodge, you discard your displayed card and take one card from them and put it in your hand.

Lost Sense 矢志
When you have one unit of health, all your escapes are viewed as attacks.
Sun Xiu:
Sun Xiu 孙休
Revered Monarch that Died Prematurely 弥殇的景君

Feast 宴诛
Once per turn during your action phase, you can make another player choose one:
1. Discard a card.
2. Allow you to get all cards in their equipment area, then you lose this ability until the end of the game, and you upgrade Lesson permanently.

Lesson 兴学
After your discard phase, you can select up to X characters (where X is your current health), and then in playing order, they draw a card and put a card on top of the deck.
If upgraded, X is your maximum health instead.

Imperial Order 诏缚
King Ability: Other players within your range are viewed as being in the attack range of other Wu members.
Zhu Zhi:
Zhu Zhi 朱治
Endless Working for the King 王事靡盬

Secure Nation 安國
Once per turn during your action phase, you can select an equipment card in the equipment zone of another player and return it to their hand. If the number of players within their attack range has reduced, you draw a card.
Quan Cong:
Quan Cong 全琮
Bringing Honour to One's Ancestors 慕勢耀族

Invitation 邀名
Once per turn, when you deal or take damage, you can choose one:
1. Discard a hand card from a player with more hand cards than you.
2. Make a player who has less hand cards than you draw a card.
3. Allow a person who has the same the number of hand cards as you to discard up to two cards, then draw an equal amount of cards.
Gong Sun Yuan:
Gong Sun Yuan 公孙渊
Cunning and Dangerous 狡徒懸海

Dissatisfication 懷異
Once per turn during your action phase, you can display all your hand cards. If these cards aren't the same colour, you discard all the cards of one colour, and then get one card from up to X characters (X is the number of cards discarded) to put into your hand. If the cards you get this way are more than one, you lose one unit of health.
Guo Tu & Feng Ji:
Guo Tu & Feng Ji 郭圖&逢紀
Both Ends of the Fierce Snake 兇蛇兩端

Impatient Attack 急攻
At the beginning of your action phase, you can draw two cards. If you do, your hand size limit this turn becomes X (X is the damage you have caused this action phase).

Shun Responsibility 飾非
Whenever you need to use or play an escape, you can make the current turn's player draw a card. Then, if they are not the only player with the most hand cards, you can discard a card from a player with the most number of hand cards and this is viewed as you playing an escape.
Red Hare:
Red Hare (Chitu) 
Offensive horse, reduces your range calculations to other players by one (You can reach further, but other player's distance to you remain the same).
Da Yuan:
Da Yuan 
Offensive horse, reduces your range calculations to other players by one (You can reach further, but other player's distance to you remain the same).
Zi Xing:
Zi Xing 
Offensive horse, reduces your range calculations to other players by one (You can reach further, but other player's distance to you remain the same).
Di Lu:
Di Lu 
Defensive horse, increases other player's range calculations to you by one (It is harder for other players to reach you, but your range remains the same).
Shadow Runner:
Shadow Runner 
Defensive horse, increases other player's range calculations to you by one (It is harder for other players to reach you, but your range remains the same).
Storm Runner:
Storm Runner 
Defensive horse, increases other player's range calculations to you by one (It is harder for other players to reach you, but your range remains the same).
Hua Liu:
Hua Liu 
Defensive horse, increases other player's range calculations to you by one (It is harder for other players to reach you, but your range remains the same).
